scripts.pack: npm --prefix .y/page-gen run build && mkdir -p ../build/.dot/.y && cp ./.y/*.ts ../build/.dot/.y && cp tsconfig.json ../build && cp ../index.jsx ../build/Run.jsx && cp -r ../pages ../build && cp -r ../static ../build
scripts.watch: npm --prefix .y/page-gen run watch & deno run --config tsconfig.json -A --unstable --watch --no-check ../index.jsx
